text: John McIntosh (born 1876) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:People from Lanchester, County Durham Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Tow Law Town F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Jack McIntosh (English footballer)
